advice.noise_fix_before_gain: Fix the background hum first — increasing gain now can make the noise worse.
affiliate.disclosure_short: Links may be affiliate links; it doesn’t change your price.
level.note_noise_first: Noise is the primary issue. Fix it before adjusting gain.
no_speech.description: Please speak closer to the microphone or check if your mic is muted.
no_speech.title: No clear speech detected
overall.summary.fair: Good fundamentals; one issue is holding this back.
overall.summary.noticeable: Background noise is significantly impacting clarity.
overall.summary.severe: Background noise is significantly impacting clarity.
overall.summary.strong: Good fundamentals; one issue is holding this back.
results.notice.low_certainty: Results may be less reliable — try again in a quieter environment.
usecase.warn.echo: Should work for meetings, but echo may reduce clarity in larger rooms.
usecase.warn.generic: It should still work, but one issue may affect clarity.
usecase.warn.level: Should work, but you may sound quiet unless you speak closer to the mic.
usecase.warn.noise: Should work, but background noise may reduce clarity.
